meanings: 편이하다 convenient, handy, easy, useful, serviceable.
개인 신상 I sing a little.
개인 신상 I actually sing pretty well.
개인 신상 I can carry a tune.

phrases.phrase: 내일 오전 중에 탈 수 있는 편이 있습니까?
meanings: 비행기 Are there any flights tomorrow morning?
비행기 Do you have any flights tomorrow morning?

vlive.korean: 9회, "99초의 모든 것?!", 이 편이 제일 재미있었어요. The 9th episode was "Everything that happened in 99 sec.", it was the best. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A.cian - We are A.cian '7월 7일, 우리 다시 만나...잠시만 안녕!'
vlive.english: The 9th episode was "Everything that happened in 99 sec.", it was the best.

vlive.korean: 난생처음 제 편이 돼주는 이도 만났습니다. For the first time in my life, I have met someone who is on my side. 듣기 View video 엽기적인 그녀 (My Sassy Girl) : [엽기적인 그녀] TOP10 한지은 영상 공개(FULL ver.)
vlive.english: For the first time in my life, I have met someone who is on my side.

vlive.korean: 이로써 뭔가 다음 편이 만들어질듯한... I feel like there is going to be another season of this. 듣기 View video tvN : tvN '신서유기 외전-꽃보다 청춘 위너' LIVE TALK (Here Comes Trouble: Unplanned Trip LIVE TALK)

vlive.korean: 이 정도면 없는 편이네. - 이 정도면 없는 편이야. This is practically nothing. - This is practically nothing. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] VICTON X SUITS KNIGHTS - 빅톤의 정장방!
